title: goldlyre
author: goldlyre
content: Hi everybody,I won a Satori coin of 0.001 denomination recently. But the seller does not know what the address of it is. I wonder that if anybody here know where the explorer or database or list etc. of their address are still active now?Many thanks and best regards Goldlyre

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: @goldlyre i can help you here. on the website satoricoin.co.uk you can find out the corresponding BTC address by entering the satori serial. additionally you can see the hash of the transaction and if the poker chip is still loaded with the said 0.001BTC or not.

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on October 14, 2023, 06:16:48 AM@goldlyre i can help you here. on the website satoricoin.co.uk you can find out the corresponding BTC address by entering the satori serial. additionally you can see the hash of the transaction and if the poker chip is still loaded with the said 0.001BTC or not.It works! Thank you very much, man.

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: If I’m not mistaken, I’m pretty sure I downloaded a file with the database of every public address for every Satori coin ever made many years ago.Edit:  I just checked,  the file is 345 pages and it only has public address for 001 through 19,999 (if anyone needs it DM me, also I’m sure other people have the same list somewhere)

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: As per this pic, the total quantity of Satori coins is as high as 50500 pc.  The  one I've won recently has a serial number as 041209. So I'd like to know whether or not there's a complete file or database for all these coins available? BTW, I've PMed you for the matter. Thank you very much for the info!

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: As long as the tool that Mr Cygan has provided above keeps active in the future, there'll be generally no problem for the issue.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: I just created these paste-bins that have all addresses.Feel free to download and keep for your own reference 00001-09999 https://pastebin.com/hfNBzKbp10000-19999 https://pastebin.com/8xCZapHr20000-29999 https://pastebin.com/xeJQ5JjY30000-39999 https://pastebin.com/ZPB3Mhwk40000-49999 https://pastebin.com/fcTvtQhm50000-50500 https://pastebin.com/jy27p2Si**Added to Master Maker's Thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2022902.msg62998212#msg62998212

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on October 15, 2023, 11:51:11 AMI just created these paste-bins that have all addresses.Feel free to download and keep for your own reference 00001-09999 https://pastebin.com/hfNBzKbp10000-19999 https://pastebin.com/8xCZapHr20000-29999 https://pastebin.com/xeJQ5JjY30000-39999 https://pastebin.com/ZPB3Mhwk40000-49999 https://pastebin.com/fcTvtQhm50000-50500 https://pastebin.com/jy27p2Si**Added to Master Maker's Thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2022902.msg62998212#msg62998212Great databases, thanks a lot!

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: I've downloaded them quickly and bookmarked in my mobile phone. It helps tremendously.
